info.name: All dark military
info.description:
This style is combination of Lights Out (White Pages be Gone!) + Midnight Surfing (Global Dark Style).

During the merger it has turned to best one with some fixes.
info.additionalInfo: Any suggestions to improve the script are welcome.

data.title: Best one after many used styles

Awesome Style! I only have one suggestion.
